state_description: After click: Clicked div role=button aria-label=New page
llm_enhanced_instruction: Click the 'New page' button in the left sidebar to create a blank page, which will open in the main content area.
llm_context: A blank page opens in the main area with 'Untitled' at the top, 'Add icon'/'Add cover' controls, and a faint "Type '/' for commands" hint—you're now on the new page.
